lines: rgyal ba sras bcas rnams la phyag 'tshal nas
tshegs chung tsam gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin
yongs su rdzogs byed gtor ma'i rim pa ni
don gnyer thugs dang sbyar te bri bar bya
thog mar dkar gtor gyi rim pa ni
nor gyi dbang phyug rin cen gter mnga' zhing
zhes pa sh+lau ka gcig gis bstod nas
ser sna'i las kyi me yis gdungs pa rnams
skye dang skye bar khyed la skyabs su mchi
rin cen bdud rtsi'i gter gyi char rgyun gyis
sems can dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzod
mgon po nam mkha'i mdog can nor gyi char 'bebs pa
ma skyes rang bzhin dag pas sku mdog sngon por bzhugs
khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de bdag dran na
rtag tu yid la re ba'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod
rab 'byams rgya mtsho dpag med na
zhes sogs kyis mchod yon dbul
de nas sku khrus gsol ba dang
chu sbyin rnams gong ltar byas la
oM AH hUM gis byin gyis brlabs
'og nas 'byung ba ltar bsngos la
'dod don la 'phrin las bcol lo
de nas brgya rtsa'i rim pa ni
chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung
de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa
dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsung
sdig pa ci yang mi bya zhing
dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad
rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul
'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin
lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste
ngag gi sdom pa legs pa yin
yid kyi sdom pa legs pas na
thams cad du ni sdom pa legs
thams cad srung ba'i dge slong dag
sdug bsngal kun las nges par grol
